Welcome!

That's right. You can immediately notice that this is not your everyday equipment, right?

The equipment laid before you is specially made by well-known artisans. I'm sure you've heard of Nepir or Shan, right?

Oh, no. I'm sorry, but you can't buy these items with money. These items were specially ordered to give as rewards to whoever collects and brings back the gelid badges to our shop.
